import React from 'react'; import menu from '../components/menu'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import data from '../data'; export default function MenuScreen() { const menu = data.menus.find((x) => x._id === props.match,params.id); if(!menu){ return
MENU not Found
; } return (

  • {menu.name}

  • Price : Rs{menu.price}
  • Description :

    {menu.description}

  • Price
    Rs{menu.price}
  • Status
    {menu.Available > 0? in Available: Unavailable }
    Rs{menu.price}
); }
